title: End of Cura Te Ipsum (Person of Interest)(1 x 4)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: IMHO this is the best scene in the entire show. It's what got me hooked. They are both just so excellent in this scene.
"Maybe there are no good people, maybe there are only good decisions." I love it

This scene summed up how amazing this show is in every respect. Jim and the guest star here are fantastic. The dialogue, and cinematography, everything was perfect. Jim is one of the best actors of his generation.
One of the best scenes EVER!
That guy is such a coward.
description: Johns conversation with a rapist over weather he should let him live. This gets really deep really fast.
